siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Viable is a user experience analysis engine that aggregrates, sorts, and tags helpdesk, survey, and live chat customer feedback so you can ask questions about what your customers think, feel, and do -- and get human-like answers in seconds, powered by GPT-3.
blogPost.body: Viable is a user experience analysis engine that aggregrates, sorts, and tags helpdesk, survey, and live chat customer feedback so you can ask questions about what your customers think, feel, and do -- and get human-like answers in seconds, powered by GPT-3.
blogPost.title: Viable - Find immediate insights in surveys, helpdesk, and reviews
blogPost.author: Todd Goldberg

localize.description: Viable是一个用户体验分析引擎，它可以对服务台、调查和即时聊天的客户反馈进行汇总、分类和标记，这样你就可以就客户的想法、感受和行为提出问题，并在几秒钟内得到类似于人类的答案，它由GPT-3提供技术支持。
localize.tagline: 在调查、帮助台和评论中找到即时的见解。

localize.description: Viable是一個用戶體驗分析引擎，它可以對服務檯、調查和即時聊天的客戶反饋進行彙總、分類和標記，這樣你就可以就客戶的想法、感受和行爲提出問題，並在幾秒鐘內得到類似於人類的答案，它由GPT-3提供技術支持。
localize.tagline: 在調查、幫助臺和評論中找到即時的見解。

previous.excerpt: A daily battle plan that helps you define the right things that set yourself up for success. Schedules out every second of every day, gets your head right, gets you goal-oriented, and target-focused everyday. Web-app version of 10X Planner by Grant Cardone.
previous.title: 10X Planner - A daily planner for entrepreneurs that want 10X their life

localize.description: 每天的作战计划，帮助你确定正确的事情，为自己的成功做准备。排列出每一天的每一秒钟，让你的头脑正确，让你每天目标明确，目标集中。格兰特-卡东的《10X计划书》的网络应用版。
localize.tagline: 创业者想要10倍人生的每日计划书

localize.description: 每天的作戰計劃，幫助你確定正確的事情，爲自己的成功做準備。排列出每一天的每一秒鐘，讓你的頭腦正確，讓你每天目標明確，目標集中。格蘭特-卡東的《10X計劃書》的網絡應用版。
localize.tagline: 創業者想要10倍人生的每日計劃書

next.excerpt: With Portal, let your clients login on your own website and give them one place for payments, messaging, file-sharing, eSignatures, intake forms, and more.
next.title: Portal - The modern client portal

localize.description: 通过Portal，让您的客户在自己的网站上登录，并为他们提供一个地方进行支付、信息传递、文件共享、电子签名、接收表格等。
通過Portal，讓您的客戶在自己的網站上登錄，併爲他們提供一個地方進行支付、信息傳遞、文件共享、電子簽名、接收表格等。
